Detailed Description

Define a pseudo-class for a synthesizer.

Member Data Documentation

void(* SoftSynth_s::AllSoundOff)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int channelIndex )
 

Turn off all active voices on a channel as if their envelopes had finished.

AutoStopCallback functions will be called for any voice active.

int(* SoftSynth_s::EstimateMaxAmplitude)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int samplesPerFrame )
 

Estimate max audio amplitude from the synthesis engine.

int(* SoftSynth_s::GetParameter)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, SPMIDI_Parameter parameterIndex, int *valuePtr )
 

Get indexed parameter value for synthesizer.

FXP7 SoftSynth_s::masterVolume
 

void(* SoftSynth_s::NoteOff)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int voiceIndex )

FXP7 SoftSynth_s::rhythmVolume
 

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetAutoStopCallback)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, SS_AutoStopCallback *autoStopCallback, void *autoStopUserData )
 

Set function to be called when a voice stops.

This allows the voice allocator to move it to the free list.

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetChannelAftertouch)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int channelIndex, int aftertouch )
 

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetChannelBank)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int ci, int b )

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetChannelPitchBend)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int channelIndex, FXP16 semitoneOffset16 )
 

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetChannelProgram)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int channelIndex, int program )

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetChannelVolume)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int channelIndex, int volume )
 

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetGeneralMIDIMode)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int isOn )
 

Turn General MIDI on or off.

Parameters:
isOn Set to 1 to turn on General MIDI node, 0 for off.

void(* SoftSynth_s::SetMasterVolume)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, FXP7 masterVolume )
 

Set master volume where 0x080 is unity gain.

int(* SoftSynth_s::SetParameter)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, SPMIDI_Parameter parameterIndex, int value )
 

Set indexed parameter for synthesizer.

Returns:
zero or native error code

void(* SoftSynth_s::StealVoice)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int voiceIndex )
 

Mark a voice as being stolen so that value will get cross faded.

void(* SoftSynth_s::StifleVoice)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int voiceIndex )
 

Tell voice to shut up ASAP.

int(* SoftSynth_s::SynthesizeBuffer)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, void *samples, int samplesPerFrame, int bitsPerSample )
 

Read PCM audio from the synthesis engine.

void(* SoftSynth_s::TriggerDrum)( struct SoftSynth_s *synth, int voiceIndex, int channelIndex, int pitch, int velocity, int pan )
 

unsigned char SoftSynth_s::veqBassCutoff
 

Velocity EQ Bass cutoff.

Only pitches below this value will be affected.

short SoftSynth_s::veqGainAtZero
 

Velocity EQ Bass gain.

Gain at pitch zero.
